title: Chapter 2499
body:
Chapter 2499

Immortal Gourd Mountain

Beneath the Netherworld King’s stunned, terrified gaze, the vortex of tribulation clouds suddenly started revolving beneath the dome of heaven.

Murky tribulation light full of a taboo aura descended from the depths of the vortex.

Kccch!

Tribulation light swept outward like a raging current, slashing through the skies and slamming into the Platform of Rebirth. Light scattered like rain, and booms rang out.

That destructive air of calamity, like the supreme might of heaven, caused a stinging pain in the Netherworld King’s eyes, and she almost felt suffocated.

She was incomparably certain that were this streak of tribulation light to strike her, she wouldn’t even be able to flee, let alone resist. It would instantly reduce her to powder!

But against all expectations, the Platform of Rebirth didn’t move in the slightest.

On the contrary, that wisp of tribulation light scattered like rain and disappeared into nothingness.

“This…” The Netherworld King stared. She was finally starting to understand why Su Yi had chosen to prove his Dao here of all places. So, the Platform of Rebirth could resist divine tribulation!

“But where is Su Yi after being frittered away to nothingness? Don’t tell me he’s hiding inside that mysterious...
original_title: Chapter 986 - Entering the Profound Dao Once More
